attributes.action: Make St Georges day a national bank holiday for England.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
England should recognise and take the 23rd April as a national bank holiday to celebrate St Georges day. 
The fact that the Northern Irish can celebrate St Patricks day with a bank holiday and the Scottish get St Andrews day,it stands to reason that Wales and England are being totally discriminated against and that this is a total breach of Human rights.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
